explanation: [0-0] In a BMX racing arena, a man wearing a black short-sleeved shirt and helmet is seen from behind, riding a BMX bike. In the background, there is a black platform with yellow sides. A person in white clothing stands on the platform, next to a BMX bike. Several billboards are attached to the platform.

[0-3] First, the man in the black shirt rides the BMX bike up a ramp and flies into the air. A platform can be seen in the upper right, crowded with spectators. Metal fences surround the area, and colorful billboards hang above the platform. The man performs a backflip in mid-air and lands among the crowd on the platform.

[0-3] First, the man in the black shirt rides the BMX bike up a ramp and flies into the air. A platform can be seen in the upper right, crowded with spectators. Metal fences surround the area, and colorful billboards hang above the platform. The man performs a backflip in mid-air and lands among the crowd on the platform.

[3-6] The scene then switches to a side view of the man riding up the ramp and performing a backflip, landing towards the platform of spectators. People with cameras can be seen filming the event.

[6-15] The scene changes again, showing the man from behind as he rides up the ramp and executes a backflip, letting go of the handlebars during the flip and then grabbing them again before landing on the platform. The shot zooms in and slows down, replaying the moment he releases the handlebars and performs the backflip. The perspective then shifts to above the platform, capturing the man as he completes the flip, regains control of the handlebars, and lands safely. Many people in white short-sleeved shirts and staff members in orange vests surround him. After landing, the man stands up, opens his mouth wide, faces left, holds the handlebars, and drops the bike to the ground.

[15-20] The man then stands in front of the platform railing and waves his right hand. The camera pans to show the audience seated outside the track below, as well as numerous green trees and tall buildings in the background. The scene cuts to the man riding his bike up a small ramp, stopping on a red platform to perform a handstand, and then flipping off the platform. Below him lies another identical competition platform, with many spectators above. Trees and buildings are visible in the upper right corner of the frame.

[26-31] Finally, the scene shifts to the man climbing the slope beside the pool. Numerous spectators are seated above. A man in a blue short-sleeved shirt and another in a white short-sleeved shirt are on the slope, holding onto the man's wrist. The man in the white shirt slips towards the water. Both men let go of the man's wrist, and the scene cuts to the man coming ashore, soaking wet, and standing among the spectators. He raises his right fist and pumps it twice before the frame freezes.
